title: Software Automation QA Engineer - Security
summary: The SPEAR team in Apple’s Security Engineering & Architecture organization is hiring a collaborative software quality assurance engineer with a drive to ensure the quality of ambitious software security features. SPEAR is a dedicated team of engineers who work on security hardening across all of Apple’s operating systems.
description: As a Quality Assurance Automation Engineer in the SPEAR team, you will be responsible for qualifying a variety of SPEAR-developed features. This will include: Coordinating with feature teams to adopt existing automation suites, Develop comprehensive feature test plans to ensure the feature achieves its goals without regressing functionality, performance, power, stability, Implement new tests when needed to achieve adequate coverage, Automate end-to-end and unit-level testing, Manage automated testing and triage test failures, and Report on testing status and follow up to ensure regressions are addressed.
preferred_qualifications: Education: Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent experience.
